snippet: By opposing proposed guidelines to lower their high fees, bankruptcy lawyers show they are out of touch with economic realities and undermine public confidence in the bankruptcy process.
abstract: Editorial expresses support for proposed new rules issued by the Justice Department that would govern the way judges approve the fees for bankruptcy lawyers; criticizes bankruptcy lawyers for opposing the rules.
lead_paragraph: By opposing proposed guidelines to lower their high fees, bankruptcy lawyers show they are out of touch with economic realities and undermine public confidence in the bankruptcy process.
